Questions.Question:
How likely do you think it is that each of the following will happen in the next 30 years?
There will be a terrorist attack on the U.S. as bad as or worse than 9/11

How likely do you think it is that each of the following will happen in the next 30 years?
China will overtake the U.S. as the world's main superpower

How likely do you think it is that each of the following will happen in the next 30 years?
There will be increasing violence against Jews in the U.S.

Still thinking about the future of our country, how worried are you, if at all, about each of the following?
The ability of political leaders to solve the country's biggest problems
Do you have a favorable or unfavorable opinion of The United States
Do you have a favorable or unfavorable opinion of China
Do you have a favorable or unfavorable opinion of Germany
Do you have a favorable or unfavorable opinion of The United Nations

In making international policy decisions, to what extent, if at all, do you think the U.S.
takes into account the interests of other countries around the world?

How much confidence do you have in each of the following leaders to do the right thing
regarding world affairs?
U.S. President Joe Biden

How much confidence do you have in each of the following leaders to do the right thing
regarding world affairs?
Chinese President Xi Jinping

How much confidence do you have in each of the following leaders to do the right thing
regarding world affairs?
Russian President Vladimir Putin

How much confidence do you have in each of the following leaders to do the right thing
regarding world affairs?
German Chancellor Angela Merkel

How much confidence do you have in each of the following leaders to do the right thing
regarding world affairs?
French President Emmanuel Macron
What kind of leadership role should the U.S. play in the world?

Should the U.S. be the most active of the leading nations, or should it be about as active
as other leading nations?

How important, if at all, is it that the U.S. is generally respected by other countries
around the world?
Is your overall opinion of Pope Francis
Is your overall opinion of Vladimir Putin
Is your overall opinion of Benjamin Netanyahu

Thinking about the possibility of violent extremism in the country, how much of a problem, if at all, are each of the following for the country today?
Extremism in the name of Islam

Thinking about the possibility of violent extremism in the country, how much of a problem, if at all, are each of the following for the country today?
Extremism in the name of Christianity

Next are some pairs of statements that will help us understand how you feel about a number of things.
Please choose the statement that comes closer to your own views – even if neither is exactly right.

Answers.1: In foreign policy, the U.S. should take into account the interests of its allies even if it means making compromises with them
Answers.2: In foreign policy, the U.S. should follow its own national interests even when its allies strongly disagree

Questions.Question: In the future, do you think...

Answers.1: U.S. policies should try to keep it so America is the only military superpower
Answers.2: It would be acceptable if another country became as militarily powerful as the U.S.

Questions.Question:
Next are some pairs of statements that will help us understand how you feel about a number of things.
Please choose the statement that comes closer to your own views - even if neither is exactly right.

Answers.1:
Islam is more likely than other religions to encourage violence among its
believers
Answers.2: Islam does not encourage violence more than other religions

Questions.Question: Do you think the United States' initial decision to use military force in Afghanistan in 2001 was the…
Do you think the United States' decision to withdraw all troops from Afghanistan was the…
Do you think the United States mostly succeeded or mostly failed in achieving its goals in Afghanistan?
How much of a threat, if any, is Taliban control of Afghanistan to the security of the United States?

Thinking about the situation with Israelis and Palestinians these days, do you have a favorable or unfavorable opinion of each of the following?
The Israeli government

Thinking about the situation with Israelis and Palestinians these days, do you have a favorable or unfavorable opinion of each of the following?
The Palestinian government

Thinking about the situation with Israelis and Palestinians these days, do you have a favorable or unfavorable opinion of each of the following?
The Israeli people

Thinking about the situation with Israelis and Palestinians these days, do you have a favorable or unfavorable opinion of each of the following?
The Palestinian people
What do you think would be the best possible outcome of the conflict between Israel and the Palestinians?

Answers.1: The land is split into two countries, one country with an Israeli government and one country with a Palestinian government
Answers.2: All of the land is one country, governed jointly by Israelis and Palestinians together
Answers.3: All of the land is one country, with an Israeli government
Answers.4: All of the land is one country, with a Palestinian government

Questions.Question: How much have you heard about the boycott, divestment and sanctions (BDS) movement against Israel?
Generally speaking, do you support or oppose the boycott, divestment and sanctions (BDS) movement?
Which comes closest to your view, even if none is exactly right?

Answers.1: God gave the land that is now Israel to the Jewish people
Answers.2: God did not give the land that is now Israel to the Jewish people
